scripts.develop-in-main: npm run kill-verdaccio &&  npm run unset-bilt-registry && (pkill verdaccio || true)
scripts.develop-in-branch: npm run kill-verdaccio && npm run start-verdaccio && wait-on http://localhost:4873 && npm run set-bilt-to-verdaccio
scripts.set-bilt-to-verdaccio: npm config set '//localhost:4873/:_authToken' anon-token && npm config set '@bilt:registry' 'http://localhost:4873'
